mapper.select: select * from produce order by produceid desc
select bomid, b.itemcode, itemname1, itemname2, itemname3, temper, rate, roastedtime, i.itemname as itemname, i.itemid as itemid from bom b join item i on b.itemcode = i.itemcode
mapper.insert: insert into produce (producedate, produceline, producetime, itemid, itemname, process, temper, itemname1, itemname2, itemname3, amount, membercode) values(#{producedate}, #{produceline}, #{producetime}, #{itemid}, #{itemname}, #{process}, #{temper}, #{itemname1}, #{itemname2}, #{itemname3}, #{amount}, #{membercode})

insert into bom (itemcode, itemname1, itemname2, itemname3, temper, rate, roastedtime, membercode) values(#{itemcode}, #{itemname1}, #{itemname2}, #{itemname3}, #{temper}, #{rate}, #{roastedtime}, #{membercode})
mapper.select: SELECT * from item where not EXISTS (SELECT itemcode from bom where item.itemcode = bom.itemcode) and itemtype='완제품' and itemweight = 500
mapper.update: update produce set state = #{state} where produceid = #{produceid}
